entry.value: select rle.ROLCODE AS ROLE, rlf.PGMCODE AS AUTHCODE, rlf.PGMAUTH AS AUTH from DEF_RLE rle inner join DEF_RLF rlf on rlf.ROLCODE=rle.ROLCODE where rle.SYSTYP= :system and rle.STU='0' order by rle.ROLCODE, rlf.PGMCODE
select * from cfg_Sequence order by seqNode
update cfg_Sequence set nextSeq=:nextSeq,rounds=:rounds,updateTime=:updateTime where seqNode=:seqNode and nextSeq=:oldSeq
INSERT INTO cfg_Sequence (seqNode, NEXTSEQ, ROUNDS,updateTime ) VALUES (:seqNode,:nextSeq,:rounds,:updateTime)
